title: The Best and Worst Quarterback Situations in the League | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 270)
description:
The Ringer's Kevin Clark and Robert Mays take a look at the depth charts throughout the NFL to identify the teams with the worst situations for a quarterback (04:00), as well as the best places to be under center (22:00).
